sentence.text: Our case-control study investigates the possible association between seven thymine catabolic process gene polymophisms (rs1801267, rs72547602, rs1801160, rs3918290, rs1801159, rs1801158, rs1801265) and risk of colorectal cancer (CRC).
The present study suggests that the SNP rs1801160 and the AAAAAAIIStAAAAAA haplotype in the thymine catabolic process gene may also have a role in colorectal cancer risk
